page.title: 06Harpenden Carnival
page.content:
On 19th May it was Carnival Day. It was a day when everybody got together to raise money for charity. The main organisation was done by the Roundtable but the procession was organised by the Rotary Club. The theme for the carnival was dragons and devils. To lead the procession, there was a brass band and after that there were lots of floats and dragons. One of the dragons was made out of lots of different coloured sheets with a beautiful Chinese dragon head.
At the carnival there was a helter- skelter, a fun castle, lots of stalls and a fire engine for children to go on. Thousands of people were there and lots of money was raised. The money is going towards an adventure playground for children in Harpenden and to aid autistic children.
